text: Medionops is a genus of araneomorph spiders in the family Caponiidae, first described by A. Sánchez-Ruiz & Antônio Domingos Brescovit in 2017. ==Species== it contains seven species: *Medionops blades Sánchez-Ruiz & Brescovit, 2017 — Colombia *Medionops cesari (Dupérré, 2014) — Ecuador *Medionops claudiae Sánchez-Ruiz & Brescovit, 2017 — Brazil *Medionops murici Sánchez-Ruiz & Brescovit, 2017 — Brazil *Medionops ramirezi Sánchez-Ruiz & Brescovit, 2017 — Brazil *Medionops simla (Chickering, 1967) — Panama, Trinidad *Medionops tabay Sánchez-Ruiz & Brescovit, 2017 — Venezuela ==References== ==External links== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Caponiidae
title: Medionops
